00032 #include "nsISupports.idl"
00033 
00034 interface sbIServicePaneNode;
00035 interface sbILibrary;
00036 interface sbILibraryResource;
00037 
00042 [scriptable, uuid(2b7aeef4-fa67-11db-8314-0800200c9a66)]
00043 interface sbILibraryServicePaneService : nsISupports {
00044 
00045   /* \brief Suggest a library for creating a new media list
00046    *
00047    * \param aMediaListType string identifying a media list type, eg "simple"
00048    * \param aNode A service pane node to provide context for new list creation
00049    * \return a library, or null if this service can't suggest anything based on 
00050    *         the given context and type.
00051    */
00052   sbILibrary suggestLibraryForNewList (in AString aMediaListType, 
00053                                        in sbIServicePaneNode aNode);
00054 
00055 
00056   /* \brief Attempt to get a service pane node for the given library resource
00057    *         
00058    * \param aResource an sbIMediaItem, sbIMediaItem, or sbILibrary
00059    * \return a service pane node that represents the given resource, if one exists
00060    */
00061   sbIServicePaneNode getNodeForLibraryResource (in sbILibraryResource aResource);
00062   
00063 
00064   /* \brief Attempt to get a library resource for the given service pane node.
00065    *
00066    * Note that there is no guarantee that hidden service pane nodes
00067    * will have corresponding library resources
00068    *
00069    * \param aNode 
00070    * \return a sbIMediaItem, sbIMediaItem, sbILibrary, or null
00071    */    
00072   sbILibraryResource getLibraryResourceForNode (in sbIServicePaneNode aNode);
00073 };
